short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice for Real-Time National Newswire Access
description: House of Commons has a requirement for Real-Time National Newswire Access. Tender notices and documents are available on MERX.
duration_in_months: They are planning for a long period of time.
full_summary:
=====================

Advance Contract Award Notice - Real-Time National Newswire Access
================================================================

Reference Number: PW-23-01028044

Publication Date: February 28, 2023

Tender Closing Date: March 10, 2023, 13:00 (Eastern Time)

The House of Commons is seeking requests for proposal/requests for quotation for the provision of Real-Time National Newswire Access services.

**Description:**
The Department of the House of Commons requires a supplier to provide Real-Time National Newswire Access to support the exchange of information between members, staff, and the public. The selected supplier will be required to provide reliable and timely access to domestic and international news, as well as editorial content, to the House of Commons.

**Tender Details:**

* Solicitation Number: 2022045
* Tender Number: PW-23-01028044
* Tender Closing Date: March 10, 2023, 13:00 (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: Once short-listed and selected
* Expected Contract End Date: [TBD]

**Contact Information:**
The contact person for this tender is:
* Christopher Murray, Procurement Advisor
* Email: contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-995-6438

**Terms and Conditions:**
All tender submissions will be received through MERX. The successful supplier will be notified by email or phone. Tender documents may be viewed and downloaded from the MERX website. All relevant information regarding this tender is available on the MERX website.

**Language:**
English and French (Canadian Aboriginal Languages Optional).

**Pre-submission Meeting:**
A pre-submission meeting is available upon request. Interested suppliers should contact the contact person to arrange for a meeting. 

Further information may be obtained directly from the MERX website or by contacting the contact person. Supplier must respond electronically according to the method described in this notice. Suppliers may request clarification or seek additional information regarding this tender by submitting a written request to the contact person.

Proof of receipt of correspondence from the House of Commons, as well as any inquiries regarding the tender, will be accepted only if they are received by the date specified for submission of tenders.

We wish to thank the (or [several different categories] companies) who were interested in contributing to the Government of Canada by providing opportunity to save in information access and try to improve the way we work. #GovernmentOfCanada #TechnicalWritingServices (maybe)
